data.prayer: Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Qingyang, Gansu, China.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Qingyang, Gansu, China
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 98,244 who are far from you in Qingyang, Gansu, China from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Qingyang, Gansu, China. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 8,208 believers in Qingyang.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Spirit, please convict each believer in Qingyang, Gansu, China to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 99,992 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Qingyang, Gansu, China.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the county of Qingyang, Gansu, China.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
